head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINGAST, DANIEL M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINGAST, DANIEL M.

block.p: WEINGAST--Daniel M. Born July 16th, 1951, died January 7th, 2007. A renaissance man, beloved father of Shayna and Naomi, husband of Susan, stepfather to Rachel and Jake, son of Edith Weingast, brother of Jay T. Weingast and brother-in-law to Marla; and uncle of Matthew S. Weingast. Loved by all and missed by many.
